data.text:
Fonda La Masia Del Sola

Monistrol de Calders

Set within an old farmhouse and surrounded by beautiful Mediterranean forests, the Fonda La Masia Del Sola features a well-known restaurant. Free Wi-Fi and free parking are available... view morefrom

€ 90Masia El Xaloc

Calders

Set by Llobregat River, Masia El Xaloc is located in Calders. Offering an outdoor swimming pool and impressive views, the country house has free Wi-Fi and a Catalan restaurant... view morefrom

€ 40Hotel Món - Món St Benet

Sant Fruitos de Bages

Rooms at this luxury hotel have free Wi-Fi and a private terrace with views of the Sant Benet de Bages Monastery and the Sant Llorenç i l'Obac Nature Reserve. Hotel Món St Benet has modern facilities in a Mediaeval Monastery... view morefrom

€ 92Can Seuba

Rellinás

Can Seuba is a typical-Catalan country house located in the village of Rellinars, 20 km from the Montserrat Mountain. It features an outdoor terrace with panoramic views and free Wi-Fi throughout... view morefrom

€ 50Holiday Home Els Caus Vacarisses

Vacarisas

A lovely holiday house on a private property with trees of 2700m2 in the Barcelona province on a 700m height situated between two national parks Sant Llorenç del Munts and La Muntanya de Montserrat. The house is simple... view morefrom
